name: corroborating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
adding proof to an account, statement, idea, etc. with new information: corroborating evidence/reports You offer no corroborating material to back up your assertions. The patient's partner can provide useful and corroborative information about the patient's background. See
corroborate
More examplesFewer examplesThere was no corroborating testimony from witnesses.The Army checked into reports that someone there had died and closed the case after finding no corroborating evidence.Leaving out pertinent, corroborative facts is journalistic malpractice.
